description.en:
It is said that to have ‘Royal Blood’ is a curse that sets one up for a life of conflict and sacrifice.
No one really understands how it came to be or why.
What is known is that the Royal Blood is a supernatural mutation of one’s blood, carriers of this blood take
on the name of ‘Bleeders’.
The Royal Blood grants Bleeders an ability that is unique to them, this ability is called a ‘Royal’.
This Royal’s purpose depends on the Bleeder’s heart, some may seek to change the World they live in, others to protect those around them. 
Inevitably, they will clash, hence the curse.

Robbed of peace, their life will be dictated by what they choose to value most...
Royal Blood… or human heart?

On the 18th of June, year 1500. In Riva, a small town near Pavia in Italy, two brothers reunite.
Unbeknownst to them, their meeting will set this somber story in motion.
All in the pursuit of something more.

Crimson Ribbon is an amateur manga that tells the tale of the members of the Bulsara bloodline, one of the many possessing this unexplained power, and the countless scenarios that end up playing key roles in the development of their lives.
Driven by their blood, will they ever be able to find peace?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
